node.name: Toad for Cloud Databases
node.shortdescription:
Toad for Cloud Databases, with its newly released Eclipse plug-in, allows users to easily write and execute queries against cloud and "NoSQL" databases from Eclipse. Toad for Cloud Databases provides a SQL-based interface that makes it simple for developers to generate queries, migrate, browse and edit data, as well as create reports and tables in a familiar SQL view.

Version 1.6 supports SQL queries against the following targets:

* Apache HBase
* Amazon SimpleDB
* Azure Table Services
* Apache HIVE (direct Hive connection or via SSH tunnel)
* Apache Cassandra
* 10gen MongoDB
* Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, SQL Azure and other ODBC enabled SQL databases
node.body:
Toad for Cloud Databases, with its newly released Eclipse plug-in, allows users to easily write and execute queries against cloud and "NoSQL" databases from Eclipse. Toad for Cloud Databases provides a SQL-based interface that makes it simple for developers to generate queries, migrate, browse and edit data, as well as create reports and tables in a familiar SQL view.

Version 1.6 supports SQL queries against the following targets:

* Apache HBase
* Amazon SimpleDB
* Azure Table Services
* Apache HIVE (direct Hive connection or via SSH tunnel)
* Apache Cassandra
* 10gen MongoDB
* Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, SQL Azure and other ODBC enabled SQL databases
